AllowedValues.name: AllowedValues
AllowedValues.description: Stores allowed values for controlled vocabularies used in other tables

columns.name: Allowed_Value_Group
columns.description: Grouping category for related allowed values

columns.name: Allowed_Value_Code
columns.description: Short code identifier for the value

columns.name: Allowed_Value_Label
columns.description: Display label for the value in user interfaces

columns.name: Allowed_Value_Description
columns.description: Detailed description of the value and its usage

BudgetCategory.name: BudgetCategory
BudgetCategory.description: Reference table for standardized budget categories used in proposals and awards

columns.name: Category_Name
columns.description: Name of budget category (e.g., Personnel, Equipment, Travel)

columns.name: Category_Description
columns.description: Description of what expenses belong in this category

Organization.name: Organization
Organization.description: Institutional entities (not individuals) that participate in research funding flows - includes sponsors that award funding, academic units that receive and administer funding, subrecipients that receive subawards, and vendors that provide goods/services

columns.name: Organization_Type
columns.description: Type of organization (Department, College, School, Sponsor, Subrecipient, Vendor, Institute, Center)

columns.name: Parent_Organization_ID
columns.description: Reference to parent organization in hierarchy

columns.name: UEI
columns.description: Unique Entity Identifier (12-character SAM registration number)

Personnel.name: Personnel
Personnel.description: Stores information about individuals involved in projects and awards

columns.name: ORCID
columns.description: Open Researcher and Contributor ID in format XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX

columns.name: Middle_Name
columns.description: Middle name or initial of individual

columns.name: Person_Type
columns.description: Type of personnel (Faculty, Staff, Student, External, Postdoc, Resident, Fellow)

ContactDetails.name: ContactDetails
ContactDetails.description: Stores contact information for personnel and organizations

columns.name: ContactDetails_ID
columns.description: Primary key for contact detail record

columns.name: Personnel_ID
columns.description: Reference to personnel (mutually exclusive with Organization_ID)

columns.name: Organization_ID
columns.description: Reference to organization (mutually exclusive with Personnel_ID)

columns.name: AllowedValue_ID
columns.description: Type of contact (Email, Phone, Fax) from AllowedValues

columns.name: ContactDetails_Value
columns.description: The actual contact value (email address, phone number, etc.)

IndirectRate.name: IndirectRate
IndirectRate.description: Negotiated indirect cost rates (F&A rates) for organizations
IndirectRate.synonyms: F&A Rates, Overhead Rates, IDC Rates, NICRA

columns.name: IndirectRate_ID
columns.description: Primary key for indirect rate record

columns.name: Organization_ID
columns.description: Organization to which this indirect cost rate applies

columns.name: Rate_Type
columns.description: Type of indirect rate (On-Campus, Off-Campus, MTDC, TDC, Clinical Trial, Fringe Benefits, Facilities, Administrative)

columns.name: Effective_End_Date
columns.description: Date when rate expires (NULL if still active)

columns.name: Base_Type
columns.description: Base type for rate calculation (MTDC, TDC, Salaries and Wages, Direct Salaries)

columns.name: Negotiated_Agreement_ID
columns.description: Reference to negotiated rate agreement document

columns.name: Acronym
columns.description: Short acronym or abbreviation for project

columns.name: Parent_Project_ID
columns.description: Reference to parent project for sub-projects

columns.name: Project_Type_Value_ID
columns.description: Type of project from AllowedValues (Research, Training, Service, Clinical Trial, Fellowship, Infrastructure, Other)

columns.name: Abstract
columns.description: Abstract or summary description of project

columns.name: Project_Status
columns.description: Current status (Planning, Active, Completed, Suspended, Cancelled)

RFA.name: RFA
RFA.description: Represents Request for Applications or funding announcements

columns.name: RFA_ID
columns.description: Primary key for request for application

columns.name: RFA_Number
columns.description: Official RFA or funding opportunity number

columns.name: Program_Code
columns.description: Program code or activity code for the opportunity

columns.name: Opportunity_Number
columns.description: Grants.gov or other system opportunity number

columns.name: CFDA_Number
columns.description: Catalog of Federal Domestic Assistance number

columns.name: Project_ID
columns.description: Associated project (may be NULL for new projects)

columns.name: Sponsor_Organization_ID
columns.description: Organization to which proposal is submitted

columns.name: Administering_Organization_ID
columns.description: Organization that will administer the award if funded

columns.name: Previous_Proposal_ID
columns.description: Reference to previous related proposal (renewals, resubmissions)

columns.name: Internal_Approval_Status
columns.description: Internal approval status (Draft, In Review, Approved, Rejected, Withdrawn)

columns.name: Decision_Status
columns.description: Sponsor decision status (Pending, Submitted, Under Review, Awarded, Declined, Withdrawn)

ProposalBudget.name: ProposalBudget
ProposalBudget.description: Detailed budget line items for proposals by period and category

columns.name: ProposalBudget_ID
columns.description: Primary key for proposal budget line item

columns.name: Period_Number
columns.description: Budget period number (typically 1-5 for multi-year budgets)

columns.name: BudgetCategory_ID
columns.description: Budget category for this line item

columns.name: Line_Item_Description
columns.description: Description of specific budget line item

columns.name: Direct_Cost
columns.description: Direct cost amount for this line item

columns.name: Indirect_Cost
columns.description: Indirect cost amount for this line item

columns.name: Total_Cost
columns.description: Total cost (direct + indirect) for this line item

columns.name: Applied_Indirect_Rate_ID
columns.description: Indirect rate applied to this line item

columns.name: Rate_Base_Used
columns.description: Base type used for indirect rate calculation (MTDC, TDC, Salaries and Wages, Direct Salaries)

columns.name: Version_No
columns.description: Budget version number for tracking revisions

columns.name: Proposal_ID
columns.description: Proposal that resulted in this award

columns.name: Current_Total_Funded
columns.description: Current total funded amount including modifications

columns.name: Current_End_Date
columns.description: Current project period end date (may differ from original due to extensions)

columns.name: Total_Anticipated_Funding
columns.description: Total anticipated funding over full award life

columns.name: Award_Status
columns.description: Current status (Pending, Active, Closed, Suspended, Terminated)

columns.name: CFDA_Number
columns.description: Catalog of Federal Domestic Assistance number

columns.name: Federal_Award_ID
columns.description: Federal award identification number for federal awards

columns.name: Prime_Sponsor_Organization_ID
columns.description: Ultimate funding source for flow-through awards

columns.name: Flow_Through_Indicator
columns.description: Flag indicating if this is a flow-through award

Modification.name: Modification
Modification.description: Award modifications tracking funding changes, extensions, and amendments

columns.name: Event_Type_Value_ID
columns.description: Type of modification event from AllowedValues (Initial Award, Incremental Funding, No Cost Extension, Budget Revision, Scope Change, Personnel Change, Termination, Supplement, Carryforward, Administrative Change)

columns.name: Event_Timestamp
columns.description: Date and time modification was recorded in system

columns.name: Funding_Amount_Change
columns.description: Change in funding amount (positive or negative)

columns.name: New_End_Date
columns.description: New end date if modification includes date extension

columns.name: Affected_Personnel_ID
columns.description: Personnel affected by modification (for personnel changes)

columns.name: Impact_on_Budget
columns.description: Flag indicating if modification impacts budget

columns.name: Requires_Prior_Approval
columns.description: Flag indicating if sponsor prior approval was required

columns.name: Approval_Status
columns.description: Status of approval (Pending, Approved, Rejected, Not Required)

Terms.name: Terms
Terms.description: Terms and conditions for awards including payment, reporting, and special requirements

columns.name: Payment_Method
columns.description: Payment method (Reimbursement, Advance, Cost-Reimbursement, Fixed-Price, Letter-of-Credit, Payment-Request)

columns.name: Invoicing_Frequency
columns.description: How often invoices should be submitted (Monthly, Quarterly, Semi-Annual, Annual, Upon-Request, Milestone)

columns.name: Invoice_Submission_Days
columns.description: Number of days allowed for invoice submission after period end

columns.name: Special_Conditions
columns.description: Special terms and conditions of the award

columns.name: Record_Retention_Years
columns.description: Number of years records must be retained

AwardBudgetPeriod.name: AwardBudgetPeriod
AwardBudgetPeriod.description: Budget periods for awards with funding amounts and dates

columns.name: AwardBudgetPeriod_ID
columns.description: Primary key for award budget period

columns.name: Period_Status
columns.description: Status of period (Pending, Released, Active, Closed)

AwardBudget.name: AwardBudget
AwardBudget.description: Detailed budget line items for awards by budget period and category

columns.name: Award_Budget_ID
columns.description: Primary key for award budget line item

columns.name: Award_ID
columns.description: Award this budget line belongs to

columns.name: AwardBudgetPeriod_ID
columns.description: Budget period this line belongs to

columns.name: Current_Direct_Cost
columns.description: Current direct cost amount after modifications

columns.name: Current_Indirect_Cost
columns.description: Current indirect cost amount after modifications

columns.name: Current_Total_Cost
columns.description: Current total cost amount after modifications

columns.name: Rate_Base_Used
columns.description: Base type used for indirect rate calculation (MTDC, TDC, Salaries and Wages, Direct Salaries)

Subaward.name: Subaward
Subaward.description: Represents subawards issued under prime awards

columns.name: Subaward_Status
columns.description: Current status (Pending, Active, Closed, Terminated, Suspended)

columns.name: PI_Name
columns.description: Name of principal investigator at subrecipient institution

CostShare.name: CostShare
CostShare.description: Cost sharing commitments and contributions for awards

columns.name: CostShare_ID
columns.description: Primary key for cost share commitment

columns.name: Commitment_Type
columns.description: Type of cost share (Cash, In-Kind, Third-Party, Waived IDC)

columns.name: Source_Fund_Code
columns.description: Fund code for cost share source

columns.name: Is_Mandatory
columns.description: Flag indicating if cost share is mandatory or voluntary

columns.name: Met_Amount
columns.description: Amount of cost share commitment actually met

Invoice.name: Invoice
Invoice.description: Invoices submitted to sponsors for reimbursement or payment

columns.name: Period_Start_Date
columns.description: Start date of period covered by invoice

columns.name: Period_End_Date
columns.description: End date of period covered by invoice

columns.name: Cost_Share
columns.description: Cost share amount reported on invoice

columns.name: Invoice_Status
columns.description: Status (Draft, Submitted, Under Review, Approved, Paid, Rejected)

columns.name: Submission_Date
columns.description: Date invoice was submitted to sponsor

AwardDeliverable.name: AwardDeliverable
AwardDeliverable.description: Required deliverables and reports for awards with due dates and status tracking

columns.name: Deliverable_Type_Value_ID
columns.description: Type of deliverable from AllowedValues (Technical Progress Report, Financial Report, Annual Report, Final Technical Report, Final Financial Report, Property Report, Invention Disclosure, Animal Welfare Report, Data Submission, Software Release, Clinical Trial Registration, Publication, Presentation, Material Transfer, Other)

columns.name: AwardBudgetPeriod_ID
columns.description: Budget period deliverable is due for

columns.name: Deliverable_Status
columns.description: Status (Pending, In Progress, Submitted, Accepted, Revision Required, Overdue)

ProjectRole.name: ProjectRole
ProjectRole.description: Personnel roles and assignments on projects with effort allocation

columns.name: Role_Value_ID
columns.description: Role type from AllowedValues (PI, Co-PI, Co-I, Key Personnel, etc.)

columns.name: Is_Key_Personnel
columns.description: Flag indicating if this is key personnel

columns.name: FTE_Percent
columns.description: Full-time equivalent percentage allocated to role

Fund.name: Fund
Fund.description: Fund codes from institutional accounting system

columns.name: Fund_Code
columns.description: Primary key fund code from institutional accounting system

Account.name: Account
Account.description: Chart of accounts for financial transactions and general ledger coding

columns.name: Account_Code
columns.description: Primary key account code from chart of accounts

columns.name: Account_Category
columns.description: Category of account describing the nature of the expense (e.g., Salaries, Supplies, Equipment, Travel)

columns.name: Account_Type
columns.description: Type of account (Expense, Revenue, Asset, Liability, Equity)

columns.name: Parent_Account_Code
columns.description: Parent account for hierarchical chart of accounts

FinanceCode.name: FinanceCode
FinanceCode.description: Finance system codes linking awards to institutional accounting strings

columns.name: Purpose_Value_ID
columns.description: Purpose of finance code from AllowedValues (Direct Costs, Cost Share, Indirect Costs, Subcontract, Department Share, Program Income, Other)

Transaction.name: Transaction
Transaction.description: Financial transactions charged to awards from institutional accounting system

columns.name: Fund_Code
columns.description: Fund code transaction is charged to

columns.name: Account_Code
columns.description: Account code transaction is charged to

columns.name: Finance_Code
columns.description: Finance code transaction is charged to

columns.name: Fiscal_Period
columns.description: Fiscal period of transaction (typically 1-12 for months)

columns.name: Transaction_Type_Value_ID
columns.description: Type of transaction from AllowedValues (Expense, Revenue, Encumbrance, Transfer, Adjustment, Reversal, Cost Share)

columns.name: AwardBudgetPeriod_ID
columns.description: Budget period transaction is associated with

columns.name: Personnel_ID
columns.description: Personnel associated with transaction (for salary transactions)

columns.name: Is_Reconciled
columns.description: Flag indicating if transaction has been reconciled

Effort.name: Effort
Effort.description: Effort certification and tracking for personnel time charged to projects

columns.name: ProjectRole_ID
columns.description: Project role this effort record belongs to

columns.name: Period_Start_Date
columns.description: Start date of effort reporting period

columns.name: Period_End_Date
columns.description: End date of effort reporting period

columns.name: Variance_Percent
columns.description: Variance between committed and actual effort

columns.name: Is_Certified
columns.description: Flag indicating if effort has been certified

columns.name: Certification_Method
columns.description: Method used for certification (PAR, Activity Report, Timesheet, Other)

columns.name: Requires_Prior_Approval
columns.description: Flag indicating if variance requires sponsor prior approval

columns.name: Prior_Approval_Status
columns.description: Status of prior approval (Not Required, Pending, Approved, Denied)

ComplianceRequirement.name: ComplianceRequirement
ComplianceRequirement.description: Regulatory compliance requirements (IRB, IACUC, IBC, COI) for projects

columns.name: Requirement_Title
columns.description: Title of compliance requirement or protocol

columns.name: Requirement_Type
columns.description: Type of requirement (IRB, IACUC, IBC, COI, Radiation, Other)

columns.name: Review_Type
columns.description: Type of review (Exempt, Expedited, Full Board, Not Human Subjects, Administrative)

columns.name: Requirement_Status
columns.description: Current status (Draft, Submitted, In Review, Approved, Expired, Conditional Approval, Disapproved, Terminated, Suspended, Closed)

columns.name: Approval_Body
columns.description: Name of approving committee or body

columns.name: Risk_Level
columns.description: Risk level assessment (Minimal, More than Minimal, High)

ConflictOfInterest.name: ConflictOfInterest
ConflictOfInterest.description: Conflict of interest disclosures and management plans for personnel

columns.name: ConflictOfInterest_ID
columns.description: Primary key for conflict of interest disclosure

columns.name: Relationship_Type_Value_ID
columns.description: Type of relationship from AllowedValues (Financial, Consulting, Employment, Equity, Intellectual Property, Board Membership, Family, Other)

columns.name: Entity_Name
columns.description: Name of entity involved in potential conflict

columns.name: Relationship_Description
columns.description: Description of relationship and potential conflict

columns.name: ConflictOfInterest_Status
columns.description: Status (Under Review, No Conflict, Manageable Conflict, Unmanageable Conflict, Management Plan Required, Cleared)

Document.name: Document
Document.description: Document management system for proposals, awards, reports, and other files

columns.name: Document_Type_Value_ID
columns.description: Type of document from AllowedValues (Proposal, Progress Report, Financial Report, Final Report, Closeout Document, Award Notice, Modification, Correspondence, Compliance Approval, Budget, SOW, Contract, Subaward, Invoice, Receipt, Data Submission, Software Release, Publication, Presentation, Other)

columns.name: Related_Entity_Type
columns.description: Type of entity document is related to (Award, Proposal, Project, ComplianceRequirement, Subaward, Organization, Personnel, Invoice, AwardDeliverable, ConflictOfInterest)

columns.name: MIME_Type
columns.description: MIME type of document (e.g., application/pdf, image/jpeg)

columns.name: File_Hash
columns.description: Cryptographic hash for file integrity verification (SHA-256, SHA-512, etc.)

ActivityLog.name: ActivityLog
ActivityLog.description: Audit trail of all data changes and user actions in the system

columns.name: Activity_ID
columns.description: Primary key for activity log entry

columns.name: Table_Name
columns.description: Name of table that was modified

columns.name: Record_ID
columns.description: ID of record that was modified

columns.name: Action_Type
columns.description: Type of action (INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, SELECT)
